title: A jury for the federal hate crimes trial of Ahmaud Arbery's killers will be picked Monday. Here's how their views on race played a role in jury selection - CNN
content:
1. A jury for the federal hate crimes trial of Ahmaud Arbery's killers will be picked Monday. Here's how their views on race played a role in jury selection  CNN
  2. Hate crimes trial continues Monday  News4JAX
  3. In Arbery Hate Crimes Trial, Racism Will Take Center Stage  The New York Times
  4. Opening arguments in hate crimes trial for Arbery's killers expected Monday  The Washington Post
  5. Opening statements near in federal hate crimes trial of Ahmaud Arbery's killers  11Alive
description: Dozens of potential jurors will return to a Brunswick, Georgia, courthouse Monday to see if they'll be impaneled to hear the federal hate crimes trial against the men convicted of murdering Ahmaud Arbery.
